PairAndStatus

Class BLEPairing

  • java.lang.Object
    • PairAndStatus.BLEPairing

  • public class BLEPairing
extends java.lang.Object
    This will handle the pairing of a BLE device with an Android phone.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BLEPairing(java.lang.String ServiceUUID, java.lang.String CharacteristicID)
      Accepts and stores the ServiceUUID and CharacteristicID for later pairing.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Ends pairing the phone to the BLE device.

      This will find the connections that are avaliable.

      Returns the CharacteristicID from the BLE device.
      java.lang.String getServiceUUID()
      Returns the ServiceUUID from the BLE device.
      boolean isPaired()
      Checks if the pairing process was successful.
      void startPairing(java.lang.String ServiceUUID, java.lang.String CharacteristicID)
      Begins pairing the phone to the BLE device using the ServiceUUID and the CharacteristicID.

      • BLEPairing

        public BLEPairing(java.lang.String ServiceUUID,
                  java.lang.String CharacteristicID)
        Accepts and stores the ServiceUUID and CharacteristicID for later pairing.
        Parameters:
        ServiceUUID - This is the ServiceUUID from the BLE device.
        CharacteristicID - This is the CharacteristicID from the BLE device.

      • findConnections

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> findConnections()
        This will find the connections that are avaliable.
        Returns:
        A list of strings representing each possible connection

      • startPairing

        public void startPairing(java.lang.String ServiceUUID,
                         java.lang.String CharacteristicID)
        Begins pairing the phone to the BLE device using the ServiceUUID and the CharacteristicID.
        Parameters:
        ServiceUUID - This is the ServiceUUID from the BLE device.
        CharacteristicID - This is the CharacteristicID from the BLE device.

      • endPairing

        public void endPairing(java.lang.String ServiceUUID,
                       java.lang.String CharacteristicID)
        Ends pairing the phone to the BLE device.
        Parameters:
        ServiceUUID - This is the ServiceUUID from the BLE device.
        CharacteristicID - This is the CharacteristicID from the BLE device.

      • isPaired

        public boolean isPaired()
        Checks if the pairing process was successful.
        Returns:
        A boolean representing true if the BLE device is paired correctly and false if the device is not paired.
